reviewText: I was disappointed in that I thought dog grooming included trimming the dogs hair and this video did not show that at all.  It was the very basics of grooming which was not what I needed.
the video was poorly done, all it shows is how to bathe a dog, nothing about the actual grooming.  very poorly diplayed

Accent of individual narrating and that of individual performing grooming techniques was too strong and not easily understood.
Also video decription gave impression that more cutting or clipping was provided. This video offers basic instruction on bathing and nail cutiing..plus helpful hints on grooming..but litle on clipping..
With the help of this video i made my own dog into a chanpion at the show ring.  I don't have to say anything else other than these two words, "Buy this"
